description: Sum of squares of primes dividing n.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: A005063 := proc(n)        add(d^2, d= numtheory[factorset](n)) ;end proc;seq(A005063(n),n=1..40) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 08 2011
crossrefs: Cf. A067666, A081403, A048261. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, May 03 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, May 03 2009
